name: hand_weight
description: These 2lb handweights are shaped for comfort. The neoprene coating prevents slipping during use, and the faceted shape keeps the weight from rolling away. Stand out at the gym with a pair of pink Champion weights. Stay in shape and keep your muscles toned with this hexagonal C9 2lb Neoprene Hand Weight. This hand weight's neoprene coating provides a comfortable, non-slip grip. Hand weights enhance all aerobic exercise and fitness training; they help improve muscle tone and core strength.
